languages.text: "Подлинность виз Администратума и Адептус Арбитес была подтверждена при идентификации судна. Я прекрасно понимаю, что это не светский визит. Говорите прямо, зачем глава династии прибыл{mf||а} сюда лично?"

"The authenticity of the Administratum and Adeptus Arbites authorisations has been verified upon your vessel's identification. I am aware that this is not a social visit. Speak plainly: why has the head of the dynasty come here in person?"
languages.original_text: "Подлинность виз Администратума и Адептус Арбитес была подтверждена при идентификации судна. Я прекрасно понимаю, что это не светский визит. Говорите прямо, зачем глава династии прибыл{mf||а} сюда лично?"

traits.locale_text: "The authenticity of the Administratum and Adeptus Arbites visas has been verified upon the vessel's identification. I am aware that this is not a social visit. Speak plainly, why has the head of the dynasty come here in person?"

"The authenticity of the Administratum and Adeptus Arbites authorisations has been verified upon your vessel's identification. I am aware that this is not a social visit. Speak plainly: why has the head of the dynasty come here in person?"

"The authenticity of the Administratum and Adeptus Arbites authorisations has been verified upon your vessel's identification. I am aware that this is not a social visit. Speak plainly: why has the head of the dynasty come here in person?"

languages.text: «Verificamos la autenticidad de las autorizaciones del Administratum y del Adeptus Arbites en cuanto identificamos su nave. Soy consciente de que no se trata de una visita de cortesía. Hable claro: ¿por qué ha acudido {mf|el|la} líder de la dinastía en persona?».
languages.original_text: "The authenticity of the Administratum and Adeptus Arbites authorisations has been verified upon your vessel's identification. I am aware that this is not a social visit. Speak plainly: why has the head of the dynasty come here in person?"

traits.locale_text: «Verificamos la autenticidad de las autorizaciones del Administratum y del Adeptus Arbites en cuanto identificamos su nave. Soy consciente de que no se trata de una visita de cortesía. Hable claro: ¿por qué ha acudido {mf|el|la} líder de la dinastía en persona?».

languages.text: “内政部和法务部授权的真实性已经得到了核实。我明白，此次造访并不是社交访问。请开门见山地说吧，王朝的领袖为什么亲自来到了这颗行星？”
languages.original_text: "The authenticity of the Administratum and Adeptus Arbites authorisations has been verified upon your vessel's identification. I am aware that this is not a social visit. Speak plainly: why has the head of the dynasty come here in person?"

traits.locale_text: “内政部和法务部授权的真实性已经得到了核实。我明白，此次造访并不是社交访问。请开门见山地说吧，王朝的领袖为什么亲自来到了这颗行星？”

languages.text: 「行政局と高等裁定局の許可の認証は、あなたの船を特定したときに確認されました。今回は社交目的の訪問でないということは承知しています。率直に言って、どうして王朝の当主が個人的にここに来たのですか？」
languages.original_text: "The authenticity of the Administratum and Adeptus Arbites authorisations has been verified upon your vessel's identification. I am aware that this is not a social visit. Speak plainly: why has the head of the dynasty come here in person?"

traits.locale_text: 「行政局と高等裁定局の許可の認証は、あなたの船を特定したときに確認されました。今回は社交目的の訪問でないということは承知しています。率直に言って、どうして王朝の当主が個人的にここに来たのですか？」

languages.text: « L'authenticité des autorisations octroyées par l'Administratum et l'Adeptus Arbites a été confirmée lors de l'identification de votre vaisseau. J'ai bien conscience qu'il ne s'agit pas d'une visite de courtoisie. Inutile de tourner autour du pot. Dites-moi plutôt pourquoi {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie a fait le déplacement en personne. »
languages.original_text: "The authenticity of the Administratum and Adeptus Arbites authorisations has been verified upon your vessel's identification. I am aware that this is not a social visit. Speak plainly: why has the head of the dynasty come here in person?"

traits.locale_text: « L'authenticité des autorisations octroyées par l'Administratum et l'Adeptus Arbites a été confirmée lors de l'identification de votre vaisseau. J'ai bien conscience qu'il ne s'agit pas d'une visite de courtoisie. Inutile de tourner autour du pot. Dites-moi plutôt pourquoi {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie a fait le déplacement en personne. »

languages.text: "Geminizin kimliği tespit edilince Administratum ve Adeptus Arbites izinlerinin gerçekliği teyit edildi. Bunun bir nezaket ziyareti olmadığının farkındayım. Açık konuşun: Hanedanlığın başı neden bizzat buraya teşrif etti?"
languages.original_text: "The authenticity of the Administratum and Adeptus Arbites authorisations has been verified upon your vessel's identification. I am aware that this is not a social visit. Speak plainly: why has the head of the dynasty come here in person?"

traits.locale_text: "Geminizin kimliği tespit edilince Administratum ve Adeptus Arbites izinlerinin gerçekliği teyit edildi. Bunun bir nezaket ziyareti olmadığının farkındayım. Açık konuşun: Hanedanlığın başı neden bizzat buraya teşrif etti?"

languages.text: "Die Authentizität der Autorisierungen des Administratums und des Adeptus Arbites wurde im Rahmen der Identifikation Eures Schiffs verifiziert. Mir ist bewusst, dass dies kein Höflichkeitsbesuch ist. Also sagt mir: Warum ist das Oberhaupt der Dynastie persönlich hier?"
languages.original_text: "The authenticity of the Administratum and Adeptus Arbites authorisations has been verified upon your vessel's identification. I am aware that this is not a social visit. Speak plainly: why has the head of the dynasty come here in person?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Authentizität der Autorisierungen des Administratums und des Adeptus Arbites wurde im Rahmen der Identifikation Eures Schiffs verifiziert. Mir ist bewusst, dass dies kein Höflichkeitsbesuch ist. Also sagt mir: Warum ist das Oberhaupt der Dynastie persönlich hier?"
